item.title: XPL Whale Nets $38 Million Profit, Holds Over $3.6 Million Unrealized Loss on XPL Long Position
item.description: On September 3rd, based on the monitoring of @EmberCN, Techno Revenant, who manipulated the XPL settlement to make a profit of 38 million USD, continued to take a long position on XPL with 1x leverage through more than 15 addresses. At one point, it occupied 70% of the long positions of XPL on Hyperliquid.With the recent pullback in the XPL price, his XPL long position, currently worth 26 million USD (37.17 million XPL), has changed from an unrealized gain of 10 million USD a few days ago to an unrealized loss of 3.67 million USD.

item.title: KuCoin is set to launch the innovative cloud mining platform KuMining, with the product scheduled to officially go live in mid-September.
item.description: September 3rd. As per official channels, KuCoin declared the launch of its innovative cloud mining platform, KuMining. This enables individual investors to regain access to mining power at a competitive price.It is reported that the platform supports Bitcoin (BTC) and Dogecoin (DOGE), along with Litecoin (LTC) merged mining (where all Dogecoin miners utilize Elphapex DG series flagship products). It relies on globally distributed compliant mining farm infrastructure and offers 100% real mining power supply. By collaborating with professional manufacturers and energy experts, decentralized mining power is achieved. Thousands of liquid-cooled machines will be added monthly to ensure capacity expansion and real-time transparent monitoring operations. The product will be available for purchase in mid-September.

item.title: Binance Alpha Point Rule Adjustment, Doubling of New Coin Trading Volume
item.description: On September 3rd, as per an official announcement, Binance Alpha has made an adjustment to its points rules and entered a new coin exclusive reward season. The trading volume points bonus rule will be updated as follows:Tokens that are airdropped or from a TGE via Binance Alpha will be eligible for a 30-day Binance Alpha platform incentive. Users who purchase the token within 30 days of the airdrop or TGE will receive the following trading volume points bonus:For BSC chain token purchases, you will receive 4 times the Alpha trading volume;For purchases of tokens from other chains, you will receive 2 times the Alpha trading volume;For tokens that are airdropped or from a TGE by BinanceAlpha and exceed 30 days or tokens that do not have any Binance Alpha airdrop or TGE activities, they will not be subject to any trading volume points bonus rules. The Binance Wallet Alpha Leaderboard has now added a "Points+" ranking, enabling users to easily participate in the new coin exclusive r

item.title: Galaxy Digital has tokenized stocks on Solana, taking a key step in RWA [Real World Asset] integration.
item.description: On September 3rd, the Nasdaq-listed crypto company Galaxy Digital launched a plan to "tokenize its SEC-registered stock and deploy it on a mainstream blockchain." Beginning today, shareholders can tokenize GLXY stock through Superstate's Opening Bell platform.The announcement indicated that Galaxy's tokenized stock and future listings on Opening Bell may offer broader liquidity and utility through automated market makers (AMMs) and other DeFi platforms. Galaxy's tokenized stock will only be accessible to KYC-verified accredited investors, who can hold and transfer these tokens within their own crypto wallets.In May of this year, Superstate launched Opening Bell with the aim of bringing SEC-registered stocks onto the blockchain, starting with Solana. While several projects have attempted to integrate publicly traded stocks with blockchain infrastructure, Opening Bell claims to be the first platform to provide direct issuance and on-chain trading of SEC-registered public stocks, rath

item.title: Ethereum Reserve Concept Stock Surges Pre-market, BMNR Up by 3.55%
item.description: On September 3rd, based on market data, Ethereum reserve concept stocks in the US stock market showed an overall increase in pre-market trading. These included:· SharpLink Gaming (SBET.US) with a rise of 1.71%;· Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR.US) up by 3.55%;· ETHZilla (ETHZ.US) increasing by 1.50%;· BTCS (BTCS.US) with a gain of 0.98%;· COIN (Coinbase.US) up 0.66%;· Bit Digital (BTBT.US) rising by 1.15%.

item.title: A Whale Has Accumulated Over 167,000 AAVE in the Past Week, Valued at Around $53.65 Million
item.description: On September 3rd, as monitored by lookonchain, the whale address 0xF436 withdrew an additional 25,097 AAVE (approximately $7.9 million) from the exchange platform 2 hours ago. During the past week, this whale has already withdrawn a total of 167,451 AAVE (approximately $53.65 million) from the exchange platform.

item.title: European Bitcoin company Treasury has completed a $147 million financing round, acquiring over 1000 BTC
item.description: On September 3rd, as reported by Cointelegraph, the European Bitcoin company Treasury has successfully completed a fundraising round amounting to $147 million. This round was led by Winklevoss Capital and Nakamoto Holdings. Additionally, Treasury has acquired more than 1000 BTC.

item.title: The State Bank of Pakistan to Withdraw its Warning on Cryptocurrency Trading
item.description: On September 3rd, the Pakistani Ministry of Finance made an announcement. It stated that the State Bank of Pakistan will withdraw its warning regarding cryptocurrency trading. At the same time, the State Bank of Pakistan is in the process of working to launch a digital currency.Previously reported by BlockBeats, on July 27th, the Pakistani Minister of State for Cryptocurrency and Blockchain, Bilal Bin Saqib, pointed out that the country's demographic structure would drive the adoption of Bitcoin and achieve "leapfrog development", surpassing developed countries in this regard. Bilal Bin Saqib emphasized that Pakistan has 40 million crypto wallets, making it one of the top five countries globally in terms of the cryptocurrency adoption rate. The country has a median age of 20 years, a total population of 250 million, with 70% of the population being under 30 years old. "Emerging markets will achieve leapfrog development in the adoption of these new technologies, and smaller countries

item.title: Top L2 Network Linea Finally Launches Mainnet after Three Years of Development, Set to Go Live on September 10th
item.description: On September 3rd, Linea, the premier Ethereum Layer 2 network developed by Consensys, has finally launched its native token after a three-year development period. Currently, the airdrop query is officially available, and the TGE will occur on September 10th.Linea's team stated that the relationship between LINEA and ETH is similar to that of silver and gold. They will empower the Ethereum ecosystem through a native asset income mechanism, a dual-token burn model (ETH + LINEA), value flowing back to the Layer 1 network, and sustainable funding for open-source software. Their goal is to build the most ETH-centric Layer 2 network, with scaling and strengthening Ethereum being inseparable dual goals.

item.title: KuCoin Launches Innovative Cloud Mining Platform KuMining, Product to Be Available for Purchase Starting September 16th
item.description: September 3rd. According to official information, KuCoin declared the launch of the innovative cloud mining platform KuMining. This will enable individual investors to obtain hashing power at a competitive price.It is reported that the platform supports Bitcoin (BTC) and Dogecoin (DOGE), including Litecoin (LTC) merged mining. It relies on a 300-megawatt to 2-gigawatt infrastructure (provided by elphapex) and an initial 10 EH/s BTC hashing power. Through cooperation with professional manufacturers and energy experts, decentralized hashing power is achieved. Thousands of liquid-cooled machines will be added monthly to ensure capacity expansion and real-time transparent monitoring of operations. The product will be available for purchase starting from September 16th.
